think_procedure: First, I looked up the function of the binlog_group_commit_sync_delay knob in MySQL. I found that it is used to introduce a delay before the binary log group commit process. The value of the knob determines the length of the delay in microseconds. There does not seem to be a special value that changes the function of the knob or breaks the natural order. Therefore, I concluded that it is not a 'special' knob.
